channel.title: Is it possible to have 2 of the same npc as a shopkeeper
channel.description:
is it possible to have 2 of the same npcs as shopkeepers , but they sell different things?
ex:1 gem trader sells dragon sets as another one sells phats

item.title: Is it possible to have 2 of the same npc as a shopkeeper
item.dc:creator: @m0par_p0wnz m0par p0wnz
item.description:
@m0par_p0wnz wrote:

Yes it is, It says trade and talk, it does this on my brothers server on Nulodian, he has 2 pk stores in 1 npc.
But im not sure how he did it, it may be copy and pasting it twice, but it may give errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to have 2 of the same npc as a shopkeeper

item.title: Is it possible to have 2 of the same npc as a shopkeeper
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

ok…why dont u make one shop keeper with the option of selling two things, make him say i sell [blah] and [blah] if they click [blah] it will take them to wanneshop## it isnt that hard to make… make it like [if “dialouge” true;
wanneshop##
else if
wanneshop##

@1337_king wrote:

You have to put coordX and coordY you also have to make sure you write the X and Y in big, because in java, small characters and big characters make difference.

here are 2 of the shops im tryna get to work…

for some reason its not working and its coming up with an error saying that it couldnt find the variable ycoord
variable xcoord

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { // Boots Shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //boots SHOP } else if (NPCID == 1699 && coordY <= 2703 && coordY >= 9566) { // Gloves Shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 45; //Gloves SHOP

[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 04:13:38 AM[/size][hr]im using testscape… and the only thing about making npcs talk that i know how to do is make words apear over there heads… like greetings and stuff =( sry unless thats what u need to do but i doubt it

item.title: Is it possible to have 2 of the same npc as a shopkeeper
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942
an example.

} else if (NPCID == 1699 && coordY <= 3967 && coordY >= 3960) { // Boots Shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //BOOTS SHOP
If your npc is walking, in those coords, and with that npc id, it will make the shop.

Hope i could help.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible to have 2 of the same npc as a shopkeeper
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

Try like this:

} else if (NPCID == 1699 && Ycoord && Xcoord) { // Boots Shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //BOOTS SHOP
This will only let for the npc in that coordinate. you can use “between” coordinates like Ycoord >= 1245 Ycoord <= 1230 etc.
But i cant remember for the right name for the coordinate, because just the numbers wont work lol gimme a min:D

Read full topic
